roleset.name: spread thickly

example.name: usual use
example.text: [The ocean waves]-1 brough the oil to shore, *-1 making a mess of the beautiful coral coastline and slathering shellfish and aquatic plants.

example.name: arg2 as core
example.text: John slathered chili on his son's fifth hotdog.

roleset.note: frame created by Jena. Comparison with 'fill', 'pack'. Member of VNcls spray-9.7-2.

example.name: arg1 as core
example.text: Next to her lazed Sophia Pekowsky, a seventh grader from suburban Boston, who-1 *trace*-1 had slathered her face with mashed papaya, a gob of which had slid into her left ear.

with mashed papaya, a gob of which had slid into her left ear
